casebody.data:
SCOT-17-0000812 Supreme Court of Hawai'i. DATED: Honolulu, Hawai'i, November 29, 2018.

In the MATTER OF CONTESTED CASE HEARING RE CONSERVATION DISTRICT USE APPLICATION (CDUA) HA-3568 for the Thirty Meter Telescope at the Mauna Kea Science Reserve, Ka'ohe Mauka, Hamakua, Hawai'i, TMK (3)404015:009

ORDER DENYING MOTION FOR RECONSIDERATION

Upon consideration of Intervenor-Appellant Harry Fergerstrom's motion for reconsideration of this court's October 30, 2018 opinion, filed on November 19, 2018, and the record and files herein,

IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration is denied.
